main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactConsolidationECResult] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:42:15 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblFactConsolidationECResult]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblFactConsolidationECResult]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactConsolidationECResult] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:42:15 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblFactConsolidationECResult]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimConsolidationID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimECID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [LTVPassNo] [varchar](50) NOT NULL
CONSTRAINT [PK_tblFactConsolidationECResult] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimPoolID] ASC, [DimConsolidationID] ASC, [DimECID] ASC, [LTVPassNo] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
